    1. Manolas, I., Laccone, F., Cherchi, G., Malomo, L., and Cignoni, P. 2022. Automated generation of flat tileable patterns and 3D reduced model simulation. Computers & Graphics 106, 141–151.
      • DOI: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.cag.2022.05.020
      • URL
    2. Laccone, F., Manolas, I., Malomo, L., and Cignoni, P. 2022. Exploratory study on a segmented shell made of recycled-HDPE plastic. Inspiring the Next Generation, p.3590; International Conference on Spatial Structures 2020/21, 7, Spatial Structures Research Centre of the University of Surrey.
      • URL
    3. I., M., F., L., G., C., L., M., and P., C. 2022. A computational tool for the analysis of 3D bending-active structures based on the dynamic relaxation method. Smart Tools and Applications in Graphics - Eurographics Italian Chapter Conference, Cagliari, Italy, 17-18/11/2022, Eurographics Association, Eindhoven, NLD.
      • DOI: 10.2312/stag.20221250
